channel.title: Quick question

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @Newb_2341 Newb 2341
item.description:
@Newb_2341 wrote:

case 4437: //cw rocks if ((objectX == 2409 && objectY == 9503)) if(hasPick() == true) { teleportToX = absX - 2; teleportToY = absY; sendMessage("You broke the rocks and walked through"); } else if(hasPick() == false) { sendMessage("You need a pick to come through here sorry"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } break;

Try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @sarge2050 sarge2050
item.description:
@sarge2050 wrote:

ok i am making c wars and i got it going pretty good and i go to make my rocks so it will let u through if u have a pick and the code looks like this:

case 4437: //cw rocks if ((objectX == 2409 && objectY == 9503)) { if(hasPick()); teleportToX = absX - 2; teleportToY = absY; sendMessage("You broke the rocks and walked through"); } else if(!hasPick()); { sendMessage("You need a pick to come through here sorry"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; }

do u see anything wrong because it will compile and run fine but i click on it and it thiefs gems (part of the next case? ) and it will send both messages at same time…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 05:13:45 PM[/size][hr]omfg :mad: :mad: :mad: im so freaking dumb!!! :mad: :mad: :mad: i forgot the break… i am gunna see if it works right now i will post again if it doesnt work im sure it will[br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 05:14:58 PM[/size][hr]ok i got the thieving part done but… it still sends both messages and still doesnt let me through even with a pick
